ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Magical drums?
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know yer level, but at 37, I went and got my own (the scorp was blue, but had a 51 Paly with me).  It s not hard as none of the critters in the canyon
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know yer level, but at 37, I went and got my own (the scorp was blue,
but had a 51 Paly with me). It's not hard as none of the critters in the
canyon can see invis, ye just invis and track one of the Scroungers (I
think) down. Kaesora? If ye know the area well, just head down to the
Library area and /auction for one. If ye don't know it well, ask someone
who does to guide ye, or just /auction at the zone. Really, it's that
simple... no, I mean it. Honest! ;o)

-=B=-
38th
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 8:18 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical drums?


>
> --- Adam Wasserman <wassermana@...> wrote:
>
> > The coins are all droppable and most are fairly easy
> > to get.
>
> I have four coins so far -- missing the Overthere and
> Kaesora coins.
>
> I auctioned for the coin in the overthere and a 40th
> magician offered to sell me the Dalnir's coin.
> apparently somebody had purchased his last coin for
> 100 pp and he figured I'd pay the same;-)
>
> So far the most I've paid is 20 pp and that was to a
> friend who needed a port so he could get it from the
> bank. Amazing what some people will pay for an old
> coin ...
>
